alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:39PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, Rutherford, east central Maury, southeastern Williamson, northwestern Coffee and northern Bedford Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 939 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Spring Hill, or 10 miles east of Columbia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Columbia, Smyrna, Spring Hill, Walterhill, Chapel Hill, Eagleville, Christiana, I-65 East Of Columbia, Fosterville, Triune, Rover, Rockvale, Unionville and Deason. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 42 and 52. Interstate 24 between mile markers 69 and 95. Interstate 840 between mile markers 40 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Coffee; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson
